languages.text: Сенешаль Абеляр Версериан предложил медицинскую помощь — самое время ей воспользоваться.

traits.locale_text: Похищение не прошло даром для состояния наследни{mf|ка|цы}. Сенешаль Абеляр Версериан предложил медицинскую помощь — самое время ей воспользоваться.

languages.text: Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.
languages.original_text: Сенешаль Абеляр Версериан предложил медицинскую помощь — самое время ей воспользоваться.

traits.locale_text: Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.
Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.
The abduction has taken its toll on the heir. Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.
Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.
Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.
Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.

languages.text: Truchsess Abelard Werserian hat medizinische Unterstützung angeboten. Es wäre klug, sie anzunehmen.
languages.original_text: Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.

traits.locale_text: Die Entführung hat Spuren bei {mf|dem Erben|der Erbin} hinterlassen. Truchsess Abelard Werserian hat medizinische Unterstützung angeboten. Es wäre klug, sie anzunehmen.

languages.text: Le sénéchal Abélard Werserian a proposé une aide médicale. Il serait sage de l'accepter.
languages.original_text: Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.

traits.locale_text: L'héritier a beaucoup souffert de l'enlèvement. Le sénéchal Abélard Werserian a proposé une aide médicale. Il serait sage de l'accepter.

languages.text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领提供了医疗援助，接受援助才是明智的选择。
languages.original_text: Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.

traits.locale_text: 绑架事故对继承人造成了伤害。阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领提供了医疗援助，接受援助才是明智的选择。

languages.text: 家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンが医療援助を申し出た。受け入れるのが賢明な選択だろう。
languages.original_text: Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.

traits.locale_text: 家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンが医療援助を申し出た。受け入れるのが賢明な選択だろう。

languages.text: El Senescal Abelard Werserian ha ofrecido ayuda médica. Sería muy buena idea aceptarla.
languages.original_text: Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.

traits.locale_text: El secuestro ha pasado factura a{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a}. El Senescal Abelard Werserian ha ofrecido ayuda médica. Sería muy buena idea aceptarla.

languages.text: Seneşal Abelard Werserian tıbbi yardım teklifinde bulundu. Kabul etmek akıllıca olacaktır.
languages.original_text: Seneschal Abelard Werserian has offered medical assistance. Accepting it would be a wise choice.

traits.locale_text: Seneşal Abelard Werserian tıbbi yardım teklifinde bulundu. Kabul etmek akıllıca olacaktır.
